H0.text: According to legend who killed the lion represented by the constellation Leo. Perseus

H1.text: According to legend who killed the lion represented by the constellation Leo. Orpheus

H2.text: According to legend who killed the lion represented by the constellation Leo. Theseus

H3.text: According to legend who killed the lion represented by the constellation Leo. Hurcules

A4.text: Heracles defeated a lion that was attacking the city of Nemea with his bare hands.
